item.bountifulbaubles.modifierBook.toolt: §9Combine with a bauble in an anvil to set its modifier.
item.bountifulbaubles.ringIron.name: 鐵環
item.bountifulbaubles.ringGold.name: 金戒指
item.bountifulbaubles.trinketBalloon.too: §9Increases jump height and negates some fall damage.
item.bountifulbaubles.charmHermesWings.t: §dDeprecated, will probably be removed at some point maybe
item.bountifulbaubles.shieldCobalt.name: 鈷盾
item.bountifulbaubles.shieldCobalt.toolt: §9Grants immunity to knockback when held or equipped in bauble slot.
同時也起到普通盾牌的作用。
可以在鐵砧上用鐵錠修復。
item.bountifulbaubles.trinketObsidianSku: §9可以抵抗燃燒和 50% 的火焰傷害。（無法抵禦熔岩）
item.bountifulbaubles.shieldObsidian.too: §9Grants partial fire resistance and immunity to knockback when held or equipped in bauble slot.
同時也起到普通盾牌的作用。
可以在鐵砧上用黑曜石修復。
item.bountifulbaubles.trinketApple.name: 禁果
item.bountifulbaubles.ringOverclocking.t: §a眾所周知，藍色 LED 可以讓你的電腦更快更強。
item.bountifulbaubles.ringFreeAction.too: §9Grants immunity to slowness and levitation and allows free movement through cobwebs
item.bountifulbaubles.brokenBlackDragonS: §a據說黑龍鱗可以免疫凋零。 也許這個可以修一修這個破損的龍鱗？
item.bountifulbaubles.trinketBezoar.name: 牛黃
item.bountifulbaubles.trinketMixedDragon: §a有趣的是，將黑龍鱗融入牛黃內，它呈現出了兩種不同的顏色。
item.bountifulbaubles.shieldAnkh.name: 安卡之盾
item.bountifulbaubles.shieldAnkh.tooltip: §9Grants partial fire resistance and immunity to knockback and most negative status effects when held or equipped in bauble slot.
同時也起到普通盾牌的作用。
可以在鐵砧上用黑曜石修復。
item.bountifulbaubles.ringFlywheel.name: Flywheel Ring
item.bountifulbaubles.ringFlywheel.toolt: §9Stores RF and automatically charges items in inventory when worn.
§aSurely nothing bad could ever result from wearing a ring that spins dozens of times a second.
item.bountifulbaubles.ringFlywheelAdvanc: §9Stores RF and automatically charges items in inventory when worn.
§aSurely nothing bad could ever result from wearing an ender magic ring that spins dozens of times a second.
item.bountifulbaubles.magicMirror.name: 魔鏡
item.bountifulbaubles.magicMirror.toolti: §a它或許可以扭曲空間，但它無法將醜陋變為美麗，對你而言這是個不幸的消息。
item.bountifulbaubles.magicMirror.wrongd: 你覺得你離家太遠了，回不去了。
item.bountifulbaubles.potionRecall.name: 傳送藥水
_comment_0: not much point having this tooltip when there's no zing sound
item.bountifulbaubles.wormholeMirror.too: §a你可以感覺到虛空在凝視著你。
item.bountifulbaubles.potionWormhole.too: §a但是，它不能保證你傳送到安全的地方。
item.bountifulbaubles.crownGold.name: Golden Crown
§9當你吃東西的時候給予罪惡的buff（+攻擊傷害和盔甲值）。
item.bountifulbaubles.amuletSinPride.too: §9生命值為滿時或得罪惡buff（+攻擊傷害和盔甲值）。
item.bountifulbaubles.amuletSinWrath.too: §9造成暴擊後你將獲得罪惡的buff（+攻擊傷害和盔甲值）。
item.bountifulbaubles.amuletSinEnvy.name: Envy Pendant
item.bountifulbaubles.amuletSinLust.name: Lust Pendant
item.bountifulbaubles.trinketBrokenHeart: §9減少你的最高生命值用於抵擋致命傷害。
§9透過睡覺來恢復損失的生命。
item.bountifulbaubles.amuletCross.name: 十字項鍊
item.bountifulbaubles.amuletCross.toolti: §9受到傷害時可以延長玩家的無敵時間。
item.bountifulbaubles.phantomPrism.name: Phantom Prism
item.bountifulbaubles.phantomPrism.toolt: §9Toggles visibility of some armor and baubles. (Right click to open gui)
item.bountifulbaubles.disintegrationTabl: §9Craft with dungeon loot to convert it into spectral silt
item.bountifulbaubles.spectralSilt.name: 幽冥粉
item.bountifulbaubles.umbrella.name: 雨傘
item.bountifulbaubles.flareGun.name: Flare Gun
item.bountifulbaubles.flareGun.tooltip.n: §cNote: requires Albedo for flares to produce light
